Body: Possible Duplicate:  Can we use an Android phone as a Wi-Fi repeater?  It is possible to use android as WiFi access point using 3G - but, is there a way to use an existing wifi connection and not 3g as the source?Here where I am there is a wifi connection but it works only with openvpn, so I can use it with a laptop or rooted Android but I also have an iPad which can't use openvpn, so I thought I will use my android device as a private access point for my iPad. Is it possible?
Title: Can I use an existing Wifi Network as source for internet connectivity and still enable WiFi tethering?

history.Text: it is possible to use android as wifi access point using 3g - but, **is there a way to use an existing wifi connection and not 3g as the source?**Here where I am there is a wifi connection but it works only with openvpn, so I can use it with a laptop or rooted android but I also have an ipad which cant use openvpn.. so i thought i will use my android device as a private access point for my ipad.. is it possible?thanks.
use wifi as source for accesspoint?
